about_the_game:
Hell Hunter: Anti-Nomen is the frightful story of Elyon, a dhampir, the son of a vampire and a human.

Elyon is a vampire hunter, living during our days in Transylvania: his main target is slaying Dracula, the Lord of Darkness.

In this game you will prepare to hunt Dracula, you will be chased by a herd of wolves and werewolves running on the border between life and death, you will be followed by an unbeatable creature obsessed by Elyon, and you will need to survive from the siege of a herd of revenants: just a glimpse of the dark and scary atmosphere of Hell Hunter!

Follow Elyon in this new horror adventure, will you be brave enough?

This is a horror adventure audiogame which features a real time battle system in which you attack and dodge enemy attacks and completely relies on stereo sound to hear where the attacks come from and how to dodge them. It's also story driven and uses a narrator voice for story and interactions.

content_descriptors.notes:
THIS IS AN AUDIOGAME, so any adult content hasn't ANY kind of graphic representation: only audio is involved in this game.
There are scenes of death, violence, blood and torture and horror and anxiety in general. There's also a few references to alcohol and drugs

detailed_description:
Hell Hunter: Anti-Nomen is the frightful story of Elyon, a dhampir, the son of a vampire and a human.

Elyon is a vampire hunter, living during our days in Transylvania: his main target is slaying Dracula, the Lord of Darkness.

In this game you will prepare to hunt Dracula, you will be chased by a herd of wolves and werewolves running on the border between life and death, you will be followed by an unbeatable creature obsessed by Elyon, and you will need to survive from the siege of a herd of revenants: just a glimpse of the dark and scary atmosphere of Hell Hunter!

Follow Elyon in this new horror adventure, will you be brave enough?

This is a horror adventure audiogame which features a real time battle system in which you attack and dodge enemy attacks and completely relies on stereo sound to hear where the attacks come from and how to dodge them. It's also story driven and uses a narrator voice for story and interactions.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.5
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9/OpenGL compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo compatible

name: HELL HUNTER - Anti-Nomen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9/OpenGL compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: A story driven adventure horror audiogame in which you have to interact with room elements, survive to environment gimmicks and fight real time battles based only on stereo audio. Learn the enemy patterns and hear where the attacks come from to dodge their attacks in time and then attack.
